name: XavlegbmaofffassssitimiwoamndutroabcwapwaeiippohfffX
description:
'''XavlegbmaofffassssitimiwoamndutroabcwapwaeiippohfffX''', often abbreviated as '''Xavleg''', is a South African [[death metal]] band known for their brutal style and comedic themes involving [[Internet meme]]s and [[graphic violence]].

[[Ultimate Guitar]] named the band's name as one of the "weirdest [...] of all time."
